titles.title: A resolution to authorize production of documents by the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations in the case of Tarlow v. Doubleday and Company.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 9/28/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Chairman and Ranking Minority Member of the Senate Permanent Subcommittee on Investigations to provide to the Drug Enforcement Administration transcripts of the Subcommittee's closed hearings on January 12 and 13, 1977, for disclosure by the Drug Enforcement Administration to the parties in Tarlow v. Doubleday and Company, in accordance with protective procedures.
